DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Genetic Abnormality Test Method Other Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term that describes a genetic abnormality test method that was not previously mentioned or specified.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Genetic Abnormality Test Method
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._Abnormalities that occur in human cells and tissues and models of human cancer._The technique used to administer a particular examination or assessment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredDefinition: A molecular or cytogenic abnormality which occurs in either human disease states or disease models.:The technique used to administer a particular examination or assessment.

Concepts.definition: A molecular or cytogenetic abnormality which occurs in either human disease states or disease models.
The technique used to administer a particular examination or assessment.
